movies.actors: Alexandria DeBerry, Richard T. Jones, Katie Leclerc
movies.description: Taylor Collins is a golf legacy. The son of a PGA veteran, the younger brother of a PGA rookie, he has all the talent in the world-but wants nothing to do with golf or the pressure of being the next in line.
